title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.22 - Berth usage; emergency watch
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.22 - Berth usage; emergency watch

State Regulations

Every self-propelled watercraft, except pleasure craft
and fishing vessels under 110 feet in length, must at all times have on board a
person in charge with authority to take such action in any emergency as may be
demanded. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
